name: The Movement (Archangel712, Kanri)
description:
Controls

A and D to move, E to take cover in a Manhole, Space to toggle Dancing

This small Project was created as part of the 10th GamesAcademy Game-Jam. 

Bring back joy and color to the grey Dystopia you find yourself in. With the power of Dance (and your Ghettoblaster)!
